seller.title: Send a parcel with guarantee
seller.description1: You create a delivery and send the link to the recipient.
seller.description2: They pay — and the parcel is sent.

recipient.title: A parcel is waiting for you
recipient.description2: Just pay — and the parcel will be on its way to you.

seller.title: We are the guarantee between you and the recipient
seller.description2: You will receive the money only after confirmation of receipt.

recipient.title: We are the guarantee between you and the sender
recipient.description1: The service guarantees the safety of the deal.
recipient.description2: If something goes wrong — we will refund your money.

seller.title: How does it work?
seller.description1: You arrange the delivery — the recipient pays.
seller.description2: We hold the amount until the parcel is received. You get the money only after confirmation.

recipient.title: How does it work?
recipient.description1: You pay — we hold the amount until the parcel is received.
recipient.description2: The sender receives the money only after your confirmation.

shipment.shareText: Your package is ready for delivery. TTN: {{ ttn }}

withdraw.bottomAlertDescription: Your funds may be lost if you send them to a different network

payment.paymentDescription: The amount is frozen and will be transferred to the sender only after your confirmation of receipt.

sendPackage.createEmptyDescription: Specify the amount the recipient must pay. The fee will be deducted upon receipt — you will receive the amount minus the fee after the delivery is confirmed.
sendPackage.createFullfiledDescription: The recipient will pay this amount. After deducting the fee, you will receive approximately {amount− ${{fee}}}.`}
sendPackage.sendDescription: Share this link with the byer
sendPackage.ttnError: The number was not found in the system or has already been registered.
